scripts.install-deps: cd new-frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.build: cd new-frontend && pnpm install && pnpm build && cd ../backend && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd new-frontend && pnpm dev" "cd backend && pnpm build && node dist/agent.js"
